title: Episode 22 - Tom Burton Interview
itunes:title: Episode 22 - Tom Burton Interview
description: Another gold medalist for you to enjoy today as Off The Podium brings you our interview with Rio 2016 Olympic Gold Medalist in the Laser sailing class, Tom Burton. Tom goes over his career, from gaining a passion for sailing at a young age and having it intensified during the Sydney Olympics, through to the difficult days of training and maintaining his passion and narrowly missing out on a spot for the 2012 Olympics before his 2016 success. He also talks up his hopes for 2020 and his desire to try his hand at other sailing regattas in the future.

author: Ben Waterworth
